post.Title: Java desktop links of the week, June 30
post.Content:
Another quiet week this week. This is a very common pattern in the lead up to JavaOne - people tend to start working on their JavaOne projects and have less time for blogging. Anyway, enjoy the links! :-)

JavaFX

  • Johan Vos has created javafxports.org, to detail the work that is going on to get OpenJFX working under iOS and Android.
  • Gerrit Grunwald has a post announcing that he will be providing regular builds of OpenJFX for ARMv6 embedded devices (both soft and hard float).
  • Jens Deters has a post about the JavaFX Service class.
  • Jason Lee has posted a review of 'JavaFX 8: Introduction by Example'.
  • William Ant√¥nio has posted a Football World Cup application developed using JavaFX.

Griffon

  • Andres Almiray has posted the release announcement for Griffon 2.0.0.BETA2.

Catch you all next week!
